description:
Misty Knight lives! But no one will stay alive for long if Twin Angel doesn`t find a way to stop the Black Trader`s death ray from raining down destruction all across the Earth!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Saishuu Kessen! Minna no Egao o Torimodosu!
The Final Battle! Let`s Get Everyone`s Smiles Back
最終決戦! みんなの笑顔を取り戻す!
